titleStmt.title: Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that the generall be required to deliver the person of the King to such persons as both Houses shall appoint to be placed at Richmond, under such guards and in such manner as they shall thinke fit ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Die Martis 15, Junii 1647.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
